comments.body: Added the type and static forwarders. Not sure if the `val`s make sense, but they seem to work. Worth noting that other classes inside the `concurrent` package have to use these

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +17,21 @@package cats.effect

package object concurrent {
  type Ref[F[_], A] = cats.effect.kernel.Ref[F, A]
  type Deferred[F[_], A] = cats.effect.kernel.Deferred[F, A]
